ðŸ“– Summary: The spotify-downloader repository, also known as spotDL, is a Python-based command-line tool that downloads music from Spotify playlists and songs. It finds matching songs on YouTube, downloads them, and embeds album art, lyrics, and metadata into the downloaded files.
